instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: ​820-2850 - a
threads.message:
Before i don't get Green Light, i find out i had short to ground on U7000 and Q7035. 
I replaced and i get Green Light, Fan Spin without R7050.
If i put back R7050 (new), i get 4v in F7040, green light but won't turn on because that.

threads.title: ​820-2850 - a
threads.message: R7051/52 and traces to ISL ok? R7005 ok? Resistance to GND on PPBUS?

threads.title: ​820-2850 - a
threads.message:
R7051/52 also 05 is ok.
Gnd on ppbus is 4.47 mΩ [h=3][/h]

threads.title: ​820-2850 - a
threads.message: What is 4.47mOhm? That is milli which is pretty much a short. This is getting kinda annoying, I still cannot trust your measurements.

threads.title: ​820-2850 - a
threads.message: Capital M would be Mega and m would be milli, but who the fucks knows, probably measured with power applied.

threads.title: ​820-2850 - a
threads.message:
I'm not stupid. Of course i measured with NO POWER.
Yes, show me in M (capital)

threads.title: ​820-2850 - a
threads.message:
No Title

I just measured today with a new multimeter and i get that:
4.49 M (capital) Ohm

Old multimeter
4.47 M (capital) Ohm

No Power!

threads.title: ​820-2850 - a
threads.message: Does it slowly decrease from 12.6v on ppbus_g3h to 4v, or static 4v?

threads.title: ​820-2850 - a
threads.message: [USER="1"]larossmann[/USER] Without charger, just battery i get in F7040 11.66V

threads.title: ​820-2850 - a
threads.message: Does it power on with battery only??? Use power pads...

threads.title: ​820-2850 - a
threads.message: Either something missing in CHGR_BOOT or just bad ISL soldering. Sorry, doesn't make any sense that removing R7050 makes this work.
